sentences.sentence: Amazing Sun-Powered Homes in the 2011 Solar Decathlon!
sentences.translation: 2011太阳能十项全能竞赛上的7栋新奇太阳能房屋。

sentences.sentence: I'll do the scholastic decathlon and you'll win the championships.
sentences.translation: 我会参加学术十项全能，你也会赢得冠军。

sentences.sentence: Therefore, it is difficult to set up the performance pattern of the decathlon athletes.
sentences.translation: 制定十项全能运动员的成绩模式有一定的难度。
